name: Kripto Cüzdanlarını Sonraki 1 Milyar Kullanıcıya Hazır Hale Getirmek: Hesap Soyutlama

speakers.name: Doğan Alpaslan
speakers.bio:
My name is Dogan, and I'm a 20-year-old researcher and analyst who specializes in blockchain infrastructure. My adventure began with my Twitter account (@doganeth). I started writing what I posted there since I think writing is the best method to learn.

I began writing articles about blockchain about 1.5 years ago. I began my work as a columnist, and thousands of people have read my articles. I then became a researcher analyst for the Lytera team.

I am now focusing on blockchain infrastructure, modular blockchains, and other things.
